sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent>
    <label for="">Type</label>
    <select v-model="formInput.typeOfIncome">
      <option>Income</option>
      <option>Outcome</option>
    </select>
    <label for="">Comments</label>
    <input type="text" placeholder="My salary" v-model="formInput.comment" />

    <label for="">Value</label>
    <input type="number" placeholder="0" v-model="formInput.value" />

    <button class="btn-submit" type="submit" @click="addNewType">Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "FormInput",
  props: {
    formInput: {
      typeOfIncome: String,
      comment: String,
      value: Number,
    },
  },
  data: () => ({
    formInput: this.formInput,
  }),
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
